Bot Role Powers: ChatDSA has the power to add roles to users, if the user asks them to add a role.
Roles: Roles are need to see certain channel
Missing Role: If the user is missing a role, direct them to 'Channels & Roles' to assign roles

Royal Productions Member.Role Details: This role is given to all members after the accept the rules

Trusted Member.Role Details: This role is given to users who verify in the #verify channel
